pubspec.name: pub_server
pubspec.author: Dart Team <misc@dartlang.org>
pubspec.description: A Dart package containing re-usable components for making a pub package server.

platform.reason:
Error(s) prevent platform classification:

Fix dependencies in `pubspec.yaml`.

suggestions.title: Fix platform conflicts.
suggestions.description:
Error(s) prevent platform classification:

Fix dependencies in `pubspec.yaml`.

suggestions.title: Support Dart 2 in `pubspec.yaml`.
suggestions.description: The SDK constraint in pubspec.yaml doesn't allow the Dart 2.0.0 release. For information about upgrading it to be Dart 2 compatible, please see [https://www.dartlang.org/dart-2#migration](https://www.dartlang.org/dart-2#migration).

suggestions.title: Package is pre-v1 release.
suggestions.description: While there is nothing inherently wrong with versions of `0.*.*`, it usually means that the author is still experimenting with the general direction of the API.

suggestions.title: Maintain an example.
suggestions.description: None of the files in your `example/` directory matches a known example patterns. Common file name patterns include: `main.dart`, `example.dart` or you could also use `pub_server.dart`.

suggestions.title: Fix dependencies in `pubspec.yaml`.
suggestions.description:
Running `pub upgrade` failed with the following output:

```
ERR: The current Dart SDK version is 2.1.0-dev.1.0.
 
 Because pub_server requires SDK version >=1.5.0 <2.0.0, version solving failed.
```
